entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
